tool_description: Calculates Type B (systematic) uncertainty from calibration certificates, manufacturer specifications, and other non-statistical sources according to GUM methodology.

distribution_types.description: Probability distributions: normal, rectangular, triangular, U-shaped

divisor_factors.description: Custom divisor factors if not using standard distributions

error_messages: Array length mismatch: uncertainty_sources, uncertainty_values, and distribution_types must have equal length.
Invalid distribution type: Use normal, rectangular, triangular, or U-shaped.
Negative uncertainty values: All uncertainty values must be positive.
Invalid divisor factor: Custom divisor factors must be positive numbers.
Too many uncertainty sources: Maximum 20 sources supported for practical analysis.
usage: Specify uncertainty sources, their values, and probability distributions. Tool calculates standard uncertainties using appropriate divisor factors for each distribution type.

source_contributions.description: Standard uncertainty contribution from each source

divisors_used.description: Divisor factors applied for each distribution

largest_contributor.description: Name of the largest uncertainty contributor
